Class FTPClient.NatServerResolverImpl

java.lang.Object
org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPClient.NatServerResolverImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FTPClient.HostnameResolver
Enclosing class:
FTPClient
public static class FTPClient.NatServerResolverImpl extends Object implements FTPClient.HostnameResolver
Default strategy for passive NAT workaround (site-local replies are replaced.)
Since:
3.6
